alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; New River Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 5:43PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 630 PM MST... At 542 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking outflow winds from strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Carefree to near Scottsdale to McDowell Mountain Park to Salt River Tubing Recreation Area to near Kings Ranch to near Florence Junction. Movement was southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Glendale, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Apache Junction, Fountain Hills, Paradise Valley, Gold Canyon, Queen Creek, Cave Creek, Carefree, and Salt River Indian Community. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 146 and 158. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 205 and 220. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
